name: Dices
description:
With this application, you will always have a couple of dices in your pocket.

You and your friends would like to play Monopoly, or another similar game,
but you lost one or both dices ?

No problem at all! You have your iPhone and Dices application, so you can
play any dice game. Just launch this app, and tap on "Roll dices" button,
or shake the iPhone.

Two very realistic dices will roll, driven by a random number generator,
then will stop and show a new combination of random values.

Enjoy it !
